  ✖ Avoid using the scope attribute on elements other than th elements.

    <div scope={scope} />
    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ Using the scope attribute incorrectly on tables makes them difficult to navigate using the
    keyboard.

  ℹ Recommended fix

  - <div scope={scope}·/>
